title: G-B 40 driving unit
creator_credit: Edward Cook and Big Six Film Unit
brief_description: Demonstrates the Huwood Hudswell G-B 40 model mine conveyor unit driving both a top and bottom belt gate conveyor. The complete unit is seen working in a Midlands colliery illustrating that with the acute shortage of manpower existing in the British coal mining industry, equipment such as this is raising the output of each worker.
